title: Good fasting sugar but high HbA1c: Doctor clears the confusion around diabetes tests
description: Diabetes diagnosis can be tricky. A fasting blood sugar test might seem normal, but your HbA1c could be high. Understanding these tests is key for better health management.

title: Budget 2026: What decides states’ share of central taxes — and how the formula has changed over time
description: Finance Commissions have reshaped central tax sharing by shifting focus from population and poverty to fiscal capacity, demographic performance, forest cover, and GDP contribution. While income distance remains key, its weight has decreased, with population criteria evolving and new measures like GDP contribution being introduced, reflecting a balance between equity and efficiency in resource allocation.

title: Union Budget 2026: Taxpayers, investors, consumers — who gains, who hurts?
description: The Union Budget 2026 aims to balance growth, stability, and reform, offering compliance-friendly measures and targeted tax tweaks for taxpayers. While easing procedures and extending benefits for investors, it also tightens rules in select areas. Consumers receive relief on essential medical items, and businesses benefit from simplified customs, though some duty exemptions are phasing out.

description: A strong showing in Sunday’s (February 8, 2026) election would solidify Ms. Takaichi’s grip on her party and give her a mandate for ​her expansionary fiscal policy, which ⁠could heighten concerns about Japan’s finances and push bond yields higher

description: History was made at the 68th Grammy Awards with the Dalai Lama securing his first win and a K-pop act achieving a historic Grammy. Steven Spielberg earned his first Grammy, becoming an EGOT winner.

'Border 2' box office collection day 10
description: Sunny Deol's 'Border 2' continues its impressive run, crossing Rs 275 crore domestically and Rs 370 crore worldwide by its tenth day. The war drama saw a significant surge over its second weekend, earning Rs 22.5 crore on Sunday despite strong competition, showcasing its enduring box office appeal.

title: With allocation seeing 6x jump, cultural agenda spelt out in Budget 2026, : a greater global footprint
Trump tariff shadow: Budget addresses US demands, backs vulnerable sectors
Union Budget 2026-27: Higher tax share for south states, Hindi heartland states see dip
In headwinds, Budget stays the course, batters markets with tax
Mega connectivity push: Railways, highways continue to be primary drivers, take 47% of capex
In times of turmoil, a healing touch: Cancer drugs, med foods get cheaper in Budget
description: Customs duties on imported medicines for personal use and food for special medical use, have been removed. Duty on imported medicines typically ranges from 5% to 11%. Last year’s Budget exempted 36 life-saving drugs from basic customs duty. Budget has also proposed strengthening of India’s drug regulatory and clinical research ecosystem and creation of a national network of 1,000 accredited clinical trial sites.

title: ‘Hum kuch nahi kar sakte’: Pakistan captain on boycotting India match at T20 World Cup
description: Pakistan captain Salman Ali Agha confirmed the team will follow government directives regarding their participation in the T20 World Cup after it was decided they would forfeit their match against India. The Pakistan Cricket Board chairman indicated a final decision would be made soon, with the announcement coming after a meeting with the Prime Minister.

title: Delhi Confidential: House & Family
Opposition on Budget 2026: Blind to real crises, fails test of economic strategy
Washington scolds Cuba after crowds heckle U.S. diplomat
description: U.S. Charge d’Affaires Mike Hammer posted a video describing alleged harassment following a meeting with ‍local church leaders

title: Head-turners on wheels: From the only known Dodge Viper in India to Ratan Tata’s iconic cars
Prominent Venezuelan activist released after over four years in jail
description: To cries of “Freedom! Freedom! Freedom!” and applause from Catholic faithful, the 43-year-old dissident was taken to the forecourt of a Caracas church after being released from Helicoide prison

title: Rajnath praises Coast Guard’s role during Operation Sindoor, urges it to prepare 2047 roadmap
description: Addressing an event to mark the Indian Coast Guard’s 50th Raising Day, Rajnath Singh said Operation Sindoor displayed “seamless inter-service coordination” within India’s multi-layered maritime security system, and reaffirmed the role of the ICG as a “frontline force”

title: Bhupender Yadav at Idea Exchange: ‘If any doubts have arisen regarding the definition of Aravallis, I welcome the formation of a committee’
Government proposes to exempt award given by Motor Accident Claims Tribunal from income tax
description: According to the Budget document, the provisions of the Motor Vehicles Act, 1988, inter alia, provide for compensation and an interest on the compensation to be awarded by the tribunal to an individual or his/her legal heir, on account of death or permanent disability or any bodily injury under the said Act

title: Ghaziabad man watches 25 suicide videos, sets himself ablaze
description: A 25-year-old man died after setting himself ablaze in Modinagar, with police suspecting suicide after finding extensive online searches for painless death methods. However, his family alleges murder, claiming Madhur named an attacker before succumbing to his severe burns. Investigations are ongoing from all angles.

title: Viksit Bharat born out of Guru Ravidas’ philosophy, country working in mission mode to achieve it: PM Modi
Union Budget 2026: Delhi gasps as funds to combat pollution lowered
description: The Union Budget 2026-27 has slashed pollution control funding by Rs 209 crore, sparking criticism amid Delhi-NCR's severe air quality crisis. Experts lament the lack of regional focus and inadequate support for the National Clean Air Programme and EV infrastructure, despite increased clean energy allocations.  This move raises concerns about tackling the escalating public health emergency.

title: ‘Something out of ordinary’: Nirmala Sitharaman interacts with college students who witnessed Parliament's Budget session live
description: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman spoke about the efforts that are being made to ensure a “better India” for students while drawing a contrast with the India she grew up in

title: India U17 girls gear up for stringent Bangladesh test
description: A victory against Bangladesh, coupled with Bhutan failing to beat Nepal in the later kick-off, will confirm India’s spot in the title clash

title: Tata Steel Masters: Gukesh draws as Abdusattorov stretches away
description: Javokhir Sindarov did not risk anything against R Praggnanandhaa and settled for a draw to slip to second spot on 7.5 points, a half point behind compatriot Abdusattorov and it could well be an Uzbek domination in the first super-tournament of the year

title: Devika Sihag secures maiden Super 300 title at Thailand Masters
Anahat Singh in Squash on Fire final
Sabarkantha man shows rabies symptoms around 3 months after dog bite, under treatment in hospital
Education: 5 university townships, girls hostel in each district among big announcements
Different surfaces, day games in T20 WC are new challenges but we can adapt: NZ captain Santner
description: “I think we’re obviously tested a lot throughout the series. We knew that was going to be the case. We know how good India are, especially their record at home. But for us it was a great series, great prep,” Santner said

title: Welcome initiatives for cooperative ecosystem, dairy sector: Milk Marketing Federation
Lakers vs Knicks injury report & status: Playing, records and team stats
description: The Los Angeles Lakers face the New York Knicks on February 1, 2026, with both teams battling playoff implications and managing key injuries.  Player availability, particularly for guards like Austin Reaves and Jalen Brunson, will significantly impact rotations and the game's outcome.  The Lakers' scoring prowess will be tested against the Knicks' defensive focus.

title: Budget 2026: Centre continues thrust on capex, FY27 target fixed at Rs 12.22 lakh crore
Pakistan trounces Australia by 111 runs to complete a 3-0 T20 series sweep
description: Pakistan’s commanding 111-run win in the third and final game eclipsed Australia’s previous biggest defeat when England registered a 100-run win at Southampton in 2005

title: U19 World Cup: All-rounder Kanishk stars in Pakistan rout as India reaches semis
description: It was all-rounder Kanishk, whose quickfire 29-ball-35 and a 50-run stand for the eighth wicket with Khilan Patel (21 not out off 15 balls) took India U-19 to a decent 252 in 49.5 overs

title: Alcaraz hails Djokovic, savours first Australian Open title
description: “You’re ​talking about how I’m doing the things, ⁠amazing things, but what you’re doing is really inspiring,” Alcaraz told Djokovic

title: Mid-air mishap: Hot curry spills on Bengaluru passenger, costs IndiGo Rs 25,000
description: A passenger endured a shocking and painful experience when a flight attendant accidentally spilled hot curry on him shortly after takeoff from Bangkok to Bengaluru. The incident led to soiled clothes, discomfort, and embarrassment. The consumer commission found the airline vicariously liable for the lapse in service and ordered compensation.

title: Police to get ₹12,846 cr. allocation
Issues such as air pollution, jobs, health care ignored, says Oppn.
Budget will help Capital scale new heights: Gupta
description: Delhi-Varanasi high-speed rail corridor to be a game changer, boost city’s financial activity, says CM; BJP MP Khandelwal terms Budget a fine blend of practical policymaking, economic empowerment

title: Step up efforts to save native fish in Yamuna: NGT to States, authorities
Highest allocation, so far: PGI allocated Rs 2,559.65 crore,  Rs 141.79 crore more than 2025
Why this attack by the Bishnoi gang differs from past incidents in the city
India’s defence budget: A case for higher allocation
description: In the context of India’s rapidly evolving security requirements, its defence budget is middling. Our security outlays must be assessed in the context of the resources committed by nations that pose a threat to India, rather than in isolation

title: Union Budget 2026 falls short of expectations in poll-bound West Bengal
description: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee said that the Budget had nothing to offer to people of the State. The Bharatiya Janata Party  (BJP) leadership said that the infrastructure push through rail and freight corridors will push economy of the State.

title: AAP, Congress slam cut in budget, flag strain on civic services: Chandigarh gets Rs 6,545.52 crore, Rs 437.66 crore less than last year
Assam government accused of letting corporate houses take over tribal lands
description: Political parties and social organisations in Dima Hasao district cite the allotment of more than 9,000 bighas of land for limestone mining to feed cement plants and a proposed mega hydropower project

title: CWG 2030 approaching: Ahmedabad civic body sets record with 8.45 lakh MT road development in a year
Himachal CM Sukhu terms Union Budget ‘inequitable’, raises concerns over Finance Commission report
description: Himachal Pradesh CM Sukhvinder Singh Sukhu said the Budget overlooked the concerns and priorities of Himachal Pradesh, even as he raised serious concerns regarding the recently tabled 16th Finance Commission

title: Budget allocation: With increase of 5.69%, MHA outlay sees big jump as focus shifts to Census, IB
NCP will remain with BJP-led NDA, ‘up to others to decide their position’: Sunil Tatkare
Union govt to allocate Rs 5,000 cr to set up Pune Growth Hub, Rs 517 cr for metro extension
Pakistan to boycott T20 World Cup match against India, ICC warns of ‘implications’
Some give thumbs down to budget, slam STT, lack of safety steps for women
Bishnoi gang claims hit on ISI proxy Shahzad Bhatti in Portugal
description: The Lawrence Bishnoi syndicate claimed responsibility for an attack on alleged ISI henchman Shahzad Bhatti in Portugal, with hooded shooters on a bike reportedly carrying out the operation. This follows a previously undisclosed attempt in Brazil and highlights Bhatti's alleged role in orchestrating terror modules and smuggling operations.

title: What Budget 2026-27 means for different income groups?
Fund cuts in sectors that affect most needy people: Chavda on Union Budget
Budget 2026-27: Pune industry welcomes MSME equity fund, TReDS mandate; seeks AI push, export boost

Vizag’s Koney Sridhar appointed member of Hindi Advisory Committee
Oscar-nominated screenwriter of Iranian drama ‘It Was Just an Accident’ arrested in Tehran
Madras Canine Club’s dog show concludes with grand finale
Shootout outside Georgia hotel in US leaves one police officer killed, another wounded
Union Budget an inspiring blueprint for building ‘Viksit Bharat’, says U.P. CM
description: Budget will provide opportunities to the youth, security to farmers, encouragement to entrepreneurs, relief to the middle class, respect to workers, and new impetus for innovation, says Adityanath

title: Activists express concerns over Odisha government turning a blind eye to depletion of mineral resources
description: The government is facilitating mineral extraction by large corporate houses without taking a long-term view of resource sustainability, says Lingaraj, a prominent rights activist

title: Tata Steel Masters: Only 6 wins in 52 games and 69 ratings points lost, how Wijk aan Zee offered a reality check for Indian chess
Premier League: Manchester United continue winning run under Carrick with late 3-2 victory over Fulham
Genes may control your longevity, however healthily you live
ICC warns PCB on boycotting match against India in T20 World Cup asking to consider ‘long-term implications for cricket in its own country’
Top US, Israeli generals meet at Pentagon amid soaring Iran tensions
Manchester United fans wear clown masks in latest protest at club’s owners
5-year-old Ramos, his father return to Minneapolis after being released from Texas detention centre
Uttarakhand: Avalanche warning in 5 hill districts after fresh snowfall
description: Avalanche advisories are in effect for five Uttarakhand districts following fresh snowfall in higher regions. Uttarkashi, Chamoli, and Rudraprayag face Danger Level-2, while Pithoragarh and Bageshwar are at Level-1. Residents in snow-bound areas are urged to exercise caution and stay informed about weather updates.

title: Letters to The Editor — February 2, 2026
What were you doing at 22? Carlos Alcaraz conquers Melbourne
description: Carlos Alcaraz achieved a historic career Grand Slam at 22, defeating Novak Djokovic in a thrilling Australian Open final. Despite a turbulent pre-season, Alcaraz showcased remarkable composure and strategic brilliance, adapting his game to overcome the seasoned champion. His improved serve, influenced by Djokovic himself, proved pivotal in securing the Norman Brookes Challenge Cup.

title: Jennifer Lawrence ‘loosely’ plans her outfits, shares styling tip she swears by: ‘Or else, you risk looking like a lamp’
Govt’s big bet on CCUS to cut emissions: Rs 20,000 crore over five years
‘Too many Spanish legends, it felt like I was two against one’: Novak Djokovic’s tribute to a watching Rafael Nadal after his Australian Open loss to Carlos Alcaraz
What does the Budget offer urban India?
description: The Union Budget 2026 has cut urban development allocations by 11.6%, lowering funding from ₹96,777 crore to ₹85,522 crore. This reduction raises concerns about the sustainability of essential services amid rising challenges such as mass migration, climate change and infrastructure stagnation in cities

title: Know your English | Morale or moral?
Dankuni-Surat Dedicated Freight Corridor: Here’s how the new DFC could ease cargo movement from Maharashtra & Gujarat ports
Karnataka Governor Thawar Chand Gehlot withholds assent, reserves hate speech bill for President’s consideration
U-19 World Cup: How India knocked out Pakistan to reach the semifinals, despite not producing their A game
‘Declare it national health emergency’: Rahul Gandhi demands Parliament discussion on air pollution
Above the Clouds: 5 iconic paragliding spots for your next adrenaline fix
Why was Smriti Mandhana unhappy during 2025 World Cup? ‘The next day we had a flight and in the whole flight I was just disappointed’
Another bumper RBI dividend likely in FY27, disinvestments seen at Rs 80,000 crore
Union Budget 2026: Centre to set up 2 large telescopes, upgrade an existing one in Ladakh
Budget 2026-27: India cuts outlay for Iran’s Chabahar port to zero, halves Bangladesh aid amid strained ties

Union Budget: Employment push, tax relief take centre stage; Mohali voices hope and concern, Opp criticises

Mumbai Confidential
Budget 2026: What’s in store for Gujarat: Freight Corridor linking Surat & Bengal, development of archaeological sites in Lothal, Dholavira
As merger gets stalled, Tatkare says NCP will remain firmly with NDA
Union govt to allocate Rs 5,000 cr to set up Pune Growth Hub, Rs 517 cr for metro extension
IIT-Gn team builds precise sieve for industry with molecular ‘donuts’
description: The find is significant because accurate separation is essential to purify water, capture carbon, and to manufacture certain medicines

title: Ciggies costlier by up to Rs 55/pack after excise hike
description: Cigarette prices have surged by Rs 22-25 per pack of 10 following a new excise duty regime, the first tax hike in seven years. This move aligns India's tobacco taxation with global health standards. Premium cigarettes will see significant price increases, with distributors anticipating new MRPs from Monday. Concerns about smuggling and counterfeit products are rising.

title: Guru Ravidas for all, especially Dalits
4 Vastu-backed remedies to remove financial instability
description: Struggling with financial woes? Vastu Shastra offers practical solutions to invite prosperity. Activating the southeast fire zone with plants and daily lamps, keeping the north clutter-free with flowing water, and placing your locker in the southwest are key. Decluttering wealth corners and burning camphor further stabilizes finances, ensuring steady inflows and savings.

title: What is waste-to-energy technology?
Oracle may layoff up to 30,000; one of the reasons is firm's 'commitment'
description: Oracle faces potential job cuts of 20,000-30,000 to fund its massive $156 billion OpenAI partnership. The company has already incurred significant debt for data centers, and rising borrowing costs are stalling projects. OpenAI is reportedly shifting some capacity to Microsoft and Amazon, raising concerns about Oracle's delivery capabilities.

title: From field to screen: the changing landscape of ecology research
description: Ecology, like physics or genomics, has reached a level of complexity that demands specialisation. Not every physicist builds detectors and not every biologist needs to chase animals through forests. Expecting all ecologists to be field naturalists may be nostalgic rather than rational

title: Watson baptized in Israel as Shedeur Sanders meets new Browns HC
description: Cleveland Browns veteran quarterback Deshaun Watson was baptized in Israel, an experience he described as life changing. Meanwhile, new head coach Todd Monken expressed his past desire to draft Shedeur Sanders, highlighting the quarterback’s significance to the team’s plans. Cybercitizens react to Watson’s baptism and Sanders’ special meet with Monken, with one saying, they can’t wait to see the coach meet Myles Garrett.

title: IMF data puts India above US in 2026 GDP growth, Elon Musk reacts
description: Elon Musk highlighted a significant global economic shift, noting India's projected contribution to worldwide growth surpassing the United States. This observation aligns with India's robust domestic strength, accelerated manufacturing, and resilient consumer demand, positioning it as a key driver of global expansion alongside China.

title: Turning Point USA reveals platforms for rival Super Bowl halftime show
description: After months of silence, Turning Point USA has finally confirmed how fans can watch its alternative Super Bowl LX halftime show. The broadcast will stream on YouTube, X, Rumble, and several conservative TV networks. While distribution details are now clear, Turning Point USA has not revealed performers or production plans, which still leaves viewers with the question of what they will see when they tune in.

title: Review of Refuge: Stories of War (and Love) by Sunny Singh
description: This anthology showcases the resilience of women amidst the ravages of conflict

title: Bareilly: Man strangled two months after love marriage; wife, in-laws booked
description: A 33-year-old IVRI employee was found dead, initially reported as suicide but later confirmed as strangulation. Police suspect his wife and her family, citing a dispute over ancestral property and demands for a car and house. The couple had a love marriage two months prior, against their families' wishes.
